days.text: Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Mist at first. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
